mapper.select: select id, user_info_id, service_status, franchisee_id, card_id, card_name, card_type, member_card_expire_time, remaining_number, init_electricity_battery_sn, now_electricity_battery_sn, battery_deposit, order_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_franchisee_user_info where id = #{id}

select id, user_info_id, service_status, franchisee_id, card_id, card_name, card_type, member_card_expire_time, remaining_number, init_electricity_battery_sn, now_electricity_battery_sn, battery_deposit, order_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_franchisee_user_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_franchisee_user_info(user_info_id, service_status, franchisee_id, card_id, card_name, card_type, member_card_expire_time, remaining_number, init_electricity_battery_sn, now_electricity_battery_sn, battery_deposit, order_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{userInfoId}, #{serviceStatus}, #{franchiseeId}, #{cardId}, #{cardName}, #{cardType}, #{memberCardExpireTime}, #{remainingNumber}, #{initElectricityBatterySn}, #{nowElectricityBatterySn}, #{batteryDeposit}, #{orderId}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_franchisee_user_info
user_info_id = #{userInfoId},
service_status = #{serviceStatus},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
card_id = #{cardId},
card_name = #{cardName},
card_type = #{cardType},
member_card_expire_time = #{memberCardExpireTime},
remaining_number = #{remainingNumber},
init_electricity_battery_sn = #{initElectricityBatterySn},
now_electricity_battery_sn = #{nowElectricityBatterySn},
battery_deposit = #{batteryDeposit},
order_id = #{orderId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
